title: Gong_Pu履约系列--魔戒生存--I--登陆
author: Gong_Pu
txt_content:
Preface:
Introduction:Good to see you,commando.You're honor to perform this mission.Here are your orders.
First,landing to the Middle-earth.According to our the Investigation Report,the Shire will be your landing place.





Then,moving to the town that the most close to you as quick as tou can.


We will commicate with you by the Force if you're alive.Good luck!
Mission Report:Well,no food,no weapon.Luckily,the Hobbits are fiendly to the stranger.So,I needn't to worried about my safety.
And more importantly,I can "borrow" some resources from their homes.


Well,thanks to their generosity,I can surrvive and move to the town.
En....Is this the town?


Are you kidding?It's too small to be a town.
However,I can "borrow" some useful things from their taverns and windmills.
My mission is accomplished,however,I want to do some other things....

Wait,what's that?

A hole!Weapon,treasure...Interesting!

Come on,commando.It is just a storage.Aaaaaaa.....
Well,let me get some wine.Just a little~

I am fine! I am not drunk!

Believe it or not,I am not drunk!Look,There are two items on the wall.
Yes,yes,yes,I am drunk.And it's not easy.
Well,thanks for helping me when I was in need.

Let's get some fun.
For example:


More importantly:



You're welcome.I just "borrow" these things from the tavern.

后记：
怎么说呢，我发这个帖子，一是为了履行当年我答应给原子弹的魔戒生存直播。二是为了锻炼我的英语能力。
至于我的皮肤，好吧，不知道为什么正版没有显示。
我的话坚持一周一更吧。毕竟我要先用另一个世界侦查、拍照、进入世界、冒险、拍照、修改大小、必要的还要P一下。然后又要用英语发出来。
还是坚持吧。
云客位：@工总司 @原子弹1号 @焚书坑儒 
欢迎魔戒同好。
我记得有一位：@maihua
